QAData.question: Who won between Nottingham Forest and Leicester City on Sat, 14 Jan 2023 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Nottingham Forest won 2–0 over Leicester City on Sat, 14 Jan 2023 15:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Jamie Vardy has the least touches (20) of any outfield player.
Daniel Amartey is the most accurate passer (95%) in the match.
Wout Faes completed the most passes (79) in the match.
Harvey Barnes is the most fouled player in the match (4 times).
Harvey Barnes lost the most duels (11) in the match.
Morgan Gibbs-White created the most chances (4) in the match.
Brennan Johnson was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.1.
Brennan Johnson completed the most dribbles (4) in the match.
